title: Little Demon Tristana won the vote!
body:
https://nexus.leagueoflegends.com/en-gb/2019/03/the-next-tristana-skin-is/

So it seems that Tristana will join Teemos hellish troops.
Can't wait to see the progress of the skin, I voted for it.

replies.body:
Yeah, except that wasn't Tristana already a part of Teemo's hellish troops?

Weren't the Bewitching skins (Morg and Trist) serving Little Devil Teemo? Its just weird that people seem to forget that.

As far as I know, they summoned Little Devil Teemo, but do they really serve him?

And even with that story it can make sense. In alot of literature, summoning demons calls them from another dimension. Another dimension, as in another (skin) universe.
It could be that Tristana exists as a demon in the universe Little Devil Teemo got summoned from by Bewitching Tristana. Which means Tristana could possibly summon her demonic self.

And now think about the possibilities.
{{sticker:sg-lulu}}

> [{quoted}](name=SatomiKun,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=3Q4oKB6h,comment-id=00060000,timestamp=2019-03-19T17:35:14.516+0000)
>
> As far as I know, they summoned Little Devil Teemo, but do they really serve him?
> 
> And even with that story it can make sense. In alot of literature, summoning demons calls them from another dimension. Another dimension, as in another (skin) universe.
> It could be that Tristana exists as a demon in the universe Little Devil Teemo got summoned from by Bewitching Tristana. Which means Tristana could possibly summon her demonic self.
> 
> And now think about the possibilities.
> {{sticker:sg-lulu}}

...my head canon is now there's a Bewitching Teemo somewhere who summons LIttle Devil Tristana. :O
Y-Yeah, that was totally what I had in mind and not some yordle yuri.
Yordle yuri needs to be a thing. NOW!
Wait, it's not already a thing?
My favourite doujin websites are saying no, so if you encounter any, please do tell me!
Thre suggested alternative doesn't really disappoint me either :P
maybe the witches become demons when they die
https://i.pinimg.com/originals/3a/f3/2d/3af32d6582e16ce46293b836124190a9.gif

> [{quoted}](name=AbiwonKenabi,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=3Q4oKB6h,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2019-03-19T17:22:48.769+0000)
>
> Yeah, except that wasn't Tristana already a part of Teemo's hellish troops?
> 
> Weren't the Bewitching skins (Morg and Trist) serving Little Devil Teemo? Its just weird that people seem to forget that.

I just like that even Riot forgot their own lore from, what, last year? 18 months ago?
I think its been a couple years, but still.

Don't we already have Bewitching Tristana? 
I don't understand what this skin is supposed to be for, unless Tristana is somehow summoning ... herself.

For a champion with 11 skins that are mostly just copies of skins she already had anyway, and Firefighter, why did we have to get this redundant trash?

> why did we have to get this redundant trash?

Well, because the majority of people wanted it.

Bewitching Tristana and Little Demon Tristana can easily coexist. Consider that skins are supposed to be parallel universes.
Yes, Bewitching Tristana summoned Little Devil Teemo. And maybe (we don't know yet), Little Devil Teemo and Little Demon Tristana live in the same universe.

Here is the thing now: They are summoned and we never got a statement how this works. Maybe the demons which the witches summon are beings from another dimension? It is entirely possible that Tristana could then summon her demonic self from another dimension. Easy to explain.

I just thought that Little Demon looked the best of these and being an impish demon fits Tristana both visually and personality-wise.

But the majority of people wanted it because they presented the idea, they could have easily put something else there instead. Riot is tanking on their skins lately, while I'm sure she will look awesome as people have said she's already Bewitching so it's like Riot forgot about that lol.

> [{quoted}](name=Kazekiba,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=3Q4oKB6h,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2019-03-19T17:07:34.579+0000)
>
> Don't we already have Bewitching Tristana? 
> I don't understand what this skin is supposed to be for, unless Tristana is somehow summoning ... herself.
> 
> For a champion with 11 skins that are mostly just copies of skins she already had anyway, and Firefighter, why did we have to get this redundant trash?

Upvote more.

Please Riot, for the love of all that is unholy...
KEEP. THE. LITTLE. TAIL.

Demon Vi, Demon Teemo, Demon Tryndamere, Demon (High Noon) Thresh and now Demon Tristana.

The Demon team is complete
Yeah don't have a true demon support skin, unless you use an actual demon {{champion:223}}

Meh, High Noon Thresh is borderline.
Having an actual demon support would be nice. =)

Better than that sugar shit 


I'll take it
The candy skin looked cute and seeing a bubblegum explode for her E would be kinda fun. But nothing beats impish horns on girls for me.
Patrician taste

_Voted for "sugar shit".._

{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}
Me too
Personally, I voted for Galactic(?) Tristana, but I liked Little Demon as well, so I'm still happy regardless XD
I mean, Dragon Trainer is the best skin line in the game
Omega Squad 4L. (but I love Dragon Trainer also)
Veto, Hextech is the best skin line.

https://i.redd.it/034oj5spvvq11.png

"Did someone say more conscripts for my army?"

https://66.media.tumblr.com/4783402b7ca0ec3ba0ed83f3d8b5d19f/tumblr_oek4qwmUZE1qhwgudo1_400.png
I'm a little sad since I'm almost certain this means the skin will have the voice distortion that bothers me so much that I stopped using Demon Vi.
Bright Pink Trist!.... of course it wins pfft
i liked the Illaoi skin and progress so i look forward to this!! even i voted for Candy Crush - this was my close second. (back for Illaoi i voted for the right one ^^)
Ooh sweet! That's the one I had voted for. Hopefully it turns out well. The others were cool too, so it was a tough choice, but i'm excited!

What i would like to know, If the majority of the 100+ games Players would have voted for another Skin, would it count more? Since they are the ppl who actually play the champ and are more likely to buy a Skin in comparison to 1-4 game Players.
I would like to point out that I correctly predicted this.
Did you make a thread about it?
I mentioned it in threads about the vote.
I see, then I greet you, fellow esper.
Voting for the winner doesn't make you an esper, it makes you a pleb.

Ah, misunderstood you, so you expected Demon Tris to win but didn't vote for her?
Who did you want to win?
I voted for Demon Trist. It was the skin I liked most for Tristana and I also thought it was most likely going to be the pleb skin.
I voted for it too, so Im very excited to see where this one goes (especially after the disappointing journey of Illoai)

I thought it was ok, didn't have such high expectations for it probably.
Honestly, the excitement of the vote itself is the most fun for me anyway. Hope we get this stuff every year now.
YES! :D The one I voted for won! I'm hyped! Hooray! No gross candy skin!

Both my votes for Illaoi and Tristana won the competition. I am convinced that makes me an esper.

DEMON SQUAD!
Boring skin, sugar rush would've been better...
